author: danbonfil
title: LATAM Community DID
description: SSI/DID are hardly know in LATAM, let alone their benefits. If there is no community empowerment or sense of belonging; adoption wont follow
solution: Follow the Patterns of Commons Ideology and the GAIN Trust Registry parameters to promote the adoption and benefits of a LATAM Community DID
experience:
Msc Economics focused on Quantitative Finance, Incentives and Blockchain
January 2022: PhD in Management focusing in Community Policy
